website_summaries.verdict: The unique design of this massage gun make it easy to reach challenging areas without the help of a friend.
pros: While the strange design of this model can take some getting used to, it allows users to easily massage their back and other hard-to-reach areas
5 adjustable angles, 6 massage heads, and 4 speeds for a variety of uses
cons: The massage heads may become loose during use

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Massager
customer_reviews.text: Love how user friendly this massager is! Great quality and lots of different modifications based on your individual needs! Quick charge for easy wireless massaging! RENPHO is the best! ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️ ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Pettit

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A BEAST!
customer_reviews.text: Received it today and have used it for a solid hour and they’re still battery left. The massager isn’t like what you get from most of what you see in the stores, they just basically vibrate. This thing doesn’t vibrate, it actually moves back and forth, incredibly fast. My partner and I took turns for an hour, we tired out before it did! We tried each of the tips, each has very different experience, kinda like having a few different options in the one took. I can honestly say it’s one of the best massages I’ve ever had! The biggest surprise though was the case it comes in! It’s incredibly nice!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Incredible massager for a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great recovery tool for post workouts. Its portable and works for a long time after a single charge, so I carry it in my gym bag to use immediately after workouts. Its quiet, strong and flexible so I can reach difficult spots! I love this massager and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Original review appears to be missing Broke after a few days. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review with pictures about how this thing fell apart after only a few days of use. Interestingly enough that review has disappeared. Well I’m rewriting this one half heartedly to warn that this thing is poorly constructed Chinese made junk that will not last. I recommend looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun gets the job done. With its unique shape, I'm able to reach almost every area by myself, which would seem difficult to do with other "traditional" shaped massage guns. I also appreciate the many different tips that can be used on this gun. The reason why this is a 4 and not a 5, is that the adjusting head feels a bit cheap. It moves to whichever position I wanted just fine, but because there aren't any definitive clicks, I sometimes felt like it wasn't in its proper place.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Lee

customer_reviews.title: Used Unit
customer_reviews.text: Received this massager. It was clearly open and used as the box was torn and the battery was scratched where it had been inserted in the unit multiple times. Want to return and receive an unused unit. This is unacceptable and unsanitary.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: It started off quiet, but after two days using it twice a day, it has become unbelievably loud. I am very disappointed with this product after reading so many positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Randy P.

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 and a half days
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product but it stopped working after 2 and a half days. I'm extremely dissipointed. If you want a massage gun go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: This Was

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March. Unfortunately, it no longer works. My 30 day window has expired so I’m very disappointed. It did work well on muscle tissue while it lasted. Not as strong a vibration as some of the name brands but it definitely does help manipulate the tissue. Best part of it was the angle it uses for self massage. It is way easier to handle. But none of this matters because mine is broken. Paid 140 I see its now 99 with a 30 dollar discount. So disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Sioux

customer_reviews.title: Works?yes... Quality, safe, and reliable? I don't think so
customer_reviews.text: First time using used for 10 minutes, started to overheat and already started breaking. Metal pieces starting to overheat and move out of place
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Pros: We liked the attachments Battery life was as advertised Cons: No charging light indicator. Battery fitting was odd and felt not secure all the time. When pressure was lightly applied motor would halt and fail. Motor would get extremely hot after 5min of use. Handle adjustment wasn’t practical. Metal attachment housing became exposed after 2 weeks of use also extremely hot after 3 min of use ***Submitted for Return*** Purchased different massager!
customer_reviews.author: Shellann

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The massage gun is okay, but it does not provide deep enough massage even at the highest level. I bought it to get deep tissue relief, but it really does not provide this well enough. I also bought it because of the adjustable arm, but I don't think it really makes it any easier to use; I feel like to do that it would need to adjust further or in a different way. The battery also drains pretty quickly. I'm considering returning it and looking for something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I felt like it is not easy to handle, I never know where to grip it at, it keeps jumping when it hits my bones and it seems to be causing me pain and making me sore. The battery life is good, it lasts a long time. The button to slide the head into different positions is difficult to move. I’m actually going to send it back because I am not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Brown

customer_reviews.title: Heaven does exist on earth
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, be sure you secure the battery fully into the charger by giving an extra push. You cannot just drop the battery in and think it will charge. Secondly, this is the freaking breakthrough I’ve been looking for to relieve chronic back pain. Most back pain stems from specific tight muscles around the back AND the top front of the legs. Getting deep enough for relief using a foam roller or traditional massagers just doesn’t work! This is my first time using the Renphro so I cannot comment on battery life etc. But I can comment on the unbelievable release in my tight muscles and it’s truly heaven on earth. Great buy! (This is not a paid endorsement)
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item, charged battery overnight, inserted batter did not I proceeded to send back for refund, they set up to send replacement, i did not want a replacement, tomorrow when it arrives Ill return again and ask for refund
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Klusmann

customer_reviews.title: Another RENPHO product for our growing collection!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been purchasing some massage equipment to help each other out with our various injuries and muscle tightness. This rapid tension relief by RENPHO was a perfect addition to our existing collection! We love it, and so do our friends when they come and visit. It’s a great value and while it’s only been a few days with it, it feels like a quality product and it has an excellent battery life with lots of different attachment heads.
customer_reviews.author: Philimanjaro

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I've had many massagers but this is the BEST! Got my Renpho and used it after a tough day on the tennis court. It's head rotates so it can get all parts of the body, even the back. And the speed selection is excellent, I usually need high but with this massager I only needed it on the medium setting (50%), so plenty of 'reserve' power if I ever I need it. Great on calves too, one of my usual problem areas which are hard to get to with most massagers. Highly recommend it, especially for those involved in sports.
customer_reviews.author: MIKIE6453

customer_reviews.title: DISGUSTING.  RECEIVED USED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this massager and opened as soon as it was delivered. However, it was evident that they sent me a used product. There are scratches indicative of wear and tear, not because it was dinged/nicked. I am incredibly grossed out by thing professional and insanity practice.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great affordable massage unit
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a massager of this type. I have always been happy with the RENPHO products so I decided to give this a try. It shipped next day and i am happy with the great carrying case. I like that the battery is removable and can be recharged on a stand so I don’t have to leave the entire unit out to recharge. All of the different adapters look like they will be great for various massages. The unit itself is well built and the adjustable head makes it great for awkward places and is much more comfortable to use. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: scott genovese

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: I've been needing a massagee for awhile. With that being said, I've spent a long time reading all the reviews on different massagers out there. I finally stopped and bought this one, because of all it can do. Pros: 1) removable battery which comes with a. Charger. 2) Angle adjustable head. 3) Comes with several different attachments. 4) comes its own carrying case 5) it is really quiet 6) has adjustable speeds 7) fast charging 8) very long battery life when fully chargered Cons: only con I can think of, is that it is kinda heavy. I find myself switching hands when using for a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nothing
customer_reviews.text: I charged the battery. Set it all up. It did not work.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaB

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but has some weaknesses and is over priced
customer_reviews.text: Does what others do, no extra value from odd shape, still can't reach your own back. Battery contacts look frail and we bent on arrival. I'm pretty sure that will be the break point. Also, same exact product available under different branding at $40 less.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working after a month but was quickly replaced*updated review*
customer_reviews.text: The massage gun worked well for about a month and then just stopped turning on. The battery charges fine but the gun no longer works. I would avoid this product as while it is a good price as other reviews have noted it will stop working or fall apart pretty quickly. *Update* The sellers quickly replaced my broken massage gun for free after I reached out to customer service. While I am disappointed that my original gun stopped working, the sellers get points for quickly and conveniently resolving my issue and getting me a replacement. When the gun works it works well and really helps muscle recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomic and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a big and sturdy case toting the gun and all its accessories. You will have to charge it, took me about 2-3 hours for a full charge. Not sure how long tbh cause I wasn’t paying attention Until 3 hours later I saw the green light. There’s 5 different strengths/speeds and honestly I’m someone who’s in the gym constantly and I barely used 4/5 unless it was on my calves or legs. This is the most ergonomic-friendly massage gun I’ve seen. All their products are always something to praise for durability, quality, and price. You can never go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great massage but I don’t like the handle
customer_reviews.text: Great massage gun with easy to use screen and attachments but not the best design for me. I tried this one because of the handle hoping that it would be easier to hold but I found it to be more uncomfortable than just a regular hammer shaped gun. I haven’t found an easier position by adjusting the massage head outwards. Holding it between the battery and gun head actually makes me feel like I’m not putting enough pressure and the gun is not balanced when sliding. Works fine enough just not easier to hold than any other massage gun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RENPHO massage gun is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I've been shopping around for the right massage gun for about 6 months. Aside from the expensive name brands, its hard to tell which ones have the Most bang for the buck. When Amazon recommend the RENPHO massage gun I immediately knew it was the one for me. It was a complete impulse buy because of a $40 instant coupon. It arrived the next day in perfect new condition. The massager feels like a high end product and it has exceeded my expectations in every way. Its very powerful, visually appealing, easy to use, and most of all, it actually reciprocates (moves in and out) instead of being an expensive vibrator. If you have questions, just ask.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased in February and no longer works. It is defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it you can't go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Renpho massage gun , as soon I opened the package, tried it out and I absolutely love it , I injured my calf running about 2 months ago, and the pain is really bad , I am so happy with my purchase, after trying it out just for a few minutes I feel that this is going to help me to recover faster, I love te vibration, it has 4 levels you can choose, plenty of power, and 6 different heads and I love the case to keep it organized
customer_reviews.author: Zuleika Polonia

customer_reviews.title: Able to use on myself!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really powerful and the multiple heads make it quite useful for several situations (and on several people in my house!). The adjustable angles is a critical factor, I'm able to hit my own lower back and shoulders routinely without 'shrugging' which means I can actually get it to work on myself. I've taken this on 2 golf trips and it's the hero of the trip for the whole group! Also small enough to fit in the golf carts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed it and used it to relieve pain. It is easy to use. The case it comes In is nice and practical. The only issue I am having right now is not being able to remove the battery to recharge it. Waiting in hearing back from Renpho on how to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Fabs

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: It came in a carrying case; nice surprise. Easy to use and the morning after the first time I used it was the best my back felt in months. Nice array of attachments. I have never owned one of these before so I have nothing to compare it to, but it works great for me! And it's a lot cheaper than the other brands. The only annoying thing I've noticed is that the charger makes a weird high-pitched hum while charging the battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. price

customer_reviews.title: Godsend back massager
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dental hygienist and in spite of my best efforts to maintain proper ergonomics while working my job leaves me prone to musculoskeletal imbalances. This helps tremendously to work out knots and kinks in my neck and back. The handle shape/positioning easily allows me to reach my own back where my recurring knot pops up between my right shoulder blade and my spine. This is worth every penny spent.
customer_reviews.author: PaigeMarin

customer_reviews.title: The best for hard to reach places (back, shoulder)
customer_reviews.text: Love this device. I researched others and this had both high quality at right price. Do not believe all the five stars on other devices....they are fake since i brought due to their 5 star and noticed that company will give free battery if you give them 5 stars (paid ratings). Do your research and don't believe the hype. This is the BEST for me and my sore back/shoulder from tennis playing daily.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Handheld massager!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a massager like this. Wow, Im impressed! Battery life is great and the different attachments are nice to have. I workout regularly and wanted something to get the knots out. There are four setting and each are amazing! I tried all six attachments on all levels and It was awesome. It also has a rotating arm to get those hard to reach areas and to use ergonomically. Looking forward to using this on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: baaustin

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, quiet and effective
customer_reviews.text: This is my first massage gun and I’m happy with this purchase. It’s quiet (Whenever I used it, I had a movie/YouTube video playing on the TV and didn’t have any issues hearing it), powerful (I’ve been using the lowest setting out of 4) and easy to use. I’ve used it after every workout since receiving it and do feel some difference in my muscle recovery. So far, the only con is that the battery doesn’t seem to last as long as I wanted it to, but still it’s enough for me to apply it to multiple areas of my body for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad massage gun if your not an athlete and just want to massage your body once in a while. To Athletes I will not recommend, not enough power. Also Battery does not last too long. You have to recharge it after a good use.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morales

customer_reviews.title: its works well
customer_reviews.text: I work in a warehouse and have to load and unload trucks. So, I have to carry and set down a lot of packages. End of the day I am tired and super sore. Using this I am still tired but no longer sore since my aching muscles are getting relief. The device is easy to use. I only wish that the various head pieces were labeled, so I didn't have to refer to the manual.
customer_reviews.author: good

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t want to spend a ton of money on a massage gun so when this one came highly recommended in a Peloton group I’m in I decided to try it out. Glad I did. It works really well, isn’t noisy and is easy to get to spots on my back by myself thanks to the adjustable neck. Oh and I’ve used it every week since I got it a few months ago and haven’t had to charge the battery yet. I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: MWill

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! A portable massager with different intensities and massage heads. I usually use it after the gym or when my kids are being "tio energetic" ... this helps get them to calm down. I get double points with the wife for containing the kids and for giving her massages, lol. I really recommend this product, it is more of an investment than an expense! It also comes in a little case which keeps everything organized and portable. The arm is also adjustable, unlike others.
customer_reviews.author: Hezael

customer_reviews.title: Helps get out knots from back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after several days of yard work, I developed a knot or pinched nerve in my upper back. Saw this on Amazon with lots of good reviews and I must say I agree. I was surprised at how powerful it was at the highest setting ( I do not recommend starting at full power). After two days of use the knot is gone and my upper back feels much better. Highly recommend, but just be careful around bone and try not to go up on the neck too much as this is quite powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Updoc

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for all of us
customer_reviews.text: I am not an athletic person but I have my "problem" spots as probably most of us after 60. This massage gun has: * adjustable massage head with five different positions; great for getting to those hard to reach problem spots. * variety of attachments * quick, convenient charge * very powerful, I am using lower two levels out of 4 * looks good * good storage/travel case I think this is a great massage gun every household should have.
customer_reviews.author: mr116954

customer_reviews.title: Great for pros and amateurs alike!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the new Renpho Deep Tissue Massage system - it's not just a "gun" - it's far more flexible both in design and implementation. I'm an recently converted gym rat prone to over-doing it and the Renpho really helps my aching muscles. My wife is a professional dancer and body therapist; she was equally impressed. Her one complaint was that it could be lighter. I see that as a future enhancement and not a worry for me. Well done, Renpho!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great All-Around Handheld Massager
customer_reviews.text: The RENPHO Massage Gun was a great addition to my workout routine. Adding this to my rest days as a pain-reliever and also as an after-workout stretch has been a real benefit for me. The percussion speeds are actually very light to strong depending on your needs. I've used a few others from Accugun to the Jigsaw conversions and this is definitely my favorite choice. The main benefit that i enjoy is the ability to use the design of the RENPHO Massage Gun to an advantage. You can easily use it to leverage extra weight into hard to reach areas. Overall i enjoy this massage gun and plan to use it for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Crossman JR

customer_reviews.title: The best painkiller ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have done a thorough review of deep body massagers and came across this one. I think the price/value ratio was right and gave it a try. I cannot be more pleased. This is the best money I have ever spent on myself, it is versatile and the intensity cannot be improved. Do not hesitate, just get it and you will have obtained the best pain killer ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos P

customer_reviews.title: Busted & Bummed Edit: it’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Edit: received a new one a couple of days later. The massage gun feels really nice, I definitely am enjoying it. The packaging is amazing, I love the case that the RENPHO Massage Gun comes in. Makes it easy to pack in a car for trips. I like RENPHO products and my smarts scale has been solid. The massage gun a huge disappointment, I was so exited to use this product. I unpacked the massage and charged the battery, I was ready to tackle my sore muscle groups. However, the massage gun won’t do its job. The battery indicator says fully charged but the massage won’t turn on. Im returning the RENPHO Massage Gun ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable speed is great
customer_reviews.text: I use this to massage a rotater cuff injury as well as tendonitis in my achilles. So far it's great, especially for my shoulder, which always aches. This thing relieves that ache for a while as well as loosening up both achilles, which get very tight after exercise. I've only had it a month or so but now I take it wherever I go. A nice carrying case and really pleasurable after a long car ride.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful- Too Bulky
customer_reviews.text: A bit too bulky and difficult to use. It is so powerful my hands go numb when I use it and that is on low.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Louhela

customer_reviews.title: This is a great massager!
customer_reviews.text: I like this massager a lot. This massager's best feature is its handle. You are able to hold it in many different positions and get all the major muscle groups and small muscles as well. You don't even need someone to hold it for you as you can hold it for yourself due to its amazing handle. I really like this massager and I have not had any problems with it, or the battery. So far it has been a great purchase and I really enjoy using it. It has good pressure and it is easy to use. I would recommend this product to anyone that wants a good massager.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vaclavik

customer_reviews.title: It's good for hard to reach areas
customer_reviews.text: The massage gun has 6 different heads to use. I'd recommend going with the round head first and try it for a while first. The smaller heads can reach deep tissues, but you need to be careful not to injure your muscles with them. The gun shape is different from all others, they shaped in a way you can reach your back comfortably when using by your self. The drawback is low running time, I got about 2 hours of continuous run time with lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tran

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOOO GOOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not buy this sooo long ago?!?!?! I didn't know ow sore I really was until the first time I used it. Helped with my recovery between workouts, runs, and hikes. Also helps my lower back. The adjustable head and the grip is what puts this one above the rest also it is not as loud as the regular ones so I can use it while watching TV relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: After getting back into the groove of working out, I had been sore after my workouts. My trainer suggested a massage gun to help with the soreness. So after reading the reviews on this one, I decided to purchase. With prime, it was here in one day. The packaging was pristine--no missing pieces; broken or defective pieces. The intensity is spot on for a deep tissue massage. It was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Powell

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Gun Massager
customer_reviews.text: Renpho comes in a self storage box which i love each item has its own cut out. Gun it self is light and very quiet and most importantly very powerful with different speed settings. Gun it selft has adjustable head for different angles and it has battery light that tells you amount of power left in the battery. This gun works great on my calves that are super achy after training for half marathon. It is must have addition to your recovery tools.
customer_reviews.author: dariusz winkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Nice articulation, carrying case and powerful.
customer_reviews.text: I tried to read many reviews before ultimately deciding on buying this product and I'm happy that I did. I like that it articulates and I can get to hard to reach areas. It has many attachments. The carrying case much nicer than I expected for the price of the item. I compared it to another massage Percussion Gun that does not articulate and the power is almost the same. I was concerned that it wasn't going to be strong enough but I believe (have seen) that it's very close. I like the fact that the battery comes out and it's not part of the internal system making it easier to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon Purchasers

customer_reviews.title: Get relief from pain after the first use
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally write reviews but this product has been great. I had immediate relief from pain and increased mobility after my first use. I recently had knee surgery which caused my sciatica to worsen. This product was able to get me back to my daily routine. I have only had to charge this one time and it comes with all the attachments you will need. The overall quality is good and I believe it will work for a long time. I highly recommend this product for people that have ongoing pain and discomfort and are looking for relief.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I got this massager after having a pinched nerve in my neck and shoulder. It does a great job loosening the muscles. Very strong for an rechargeable. The battery holds a long charge. Solid construction and the adjustable arm makes it easy for a single person to reach any spot without assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: WOW! JUST WOW!
customer_reviews.text: This massager was recommended by a friend. Oh my goodness it’s providing relief already! I carry a lot of stress in my shoulders and upper back and the configuration lends itself to handling all of that discomfort. It has multiple attachments to meet every need plus it comes in a case to keep everything together and can be packed anywhere. Because it has a rechargeable battery you can practice being off grid and still have life’s comforts. A great investment for you and/or a thoughtful gift for others.
customer_reviews.author: L. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worthy investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, powerful massager. With the pivoting head I can reach my lower back and shoulders. Feels great after a long day. The 6 different massage attachments and variable speeds are a nice mix up. The soft foam attachments have worked well on the bottoms of my feet and muscles with big knots. The 2 prong attachment worked nicely up and down my spine. Instructions are pretty straight forward. I've gotten through a week of massages on 1 battery charge. A week's worth of massages for the cost of 1 masseuse appointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jac

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Relief....
customer_reviews.text: So I'll make this short and to the point. I have Fibromyalgia. I'm a mother of 5. My body is a mess. I have bulging discs in my back, neck. I have a herniated disk, spinal stenosis, scoliosis, sciatica and a nerve impingement. I used this on my shoulders where I have the most stiffness, it felt like the tightness just melted away. I haven't had it long enough to comment on long term but for now, it's a lifesaver. Very strong and love the fact I can use it on myself in hard to reach places because I don't always have someone to do it for me. The price was great.
customer_reviews.author: Shuree Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Massage Gun!
customer_reviews.text: My first experience with a massage gun was at a Chiropractor's office. It felt great on my back. However, it was annoying loud. I was pleasantly surprised by not only this machine's power; but also, by the quietness of the machine. I highly recommend purchasing this massage gun.
customer_reviews.author: Tom H

customer_reviews.title: Great stress relief
customer_reviews.text: Adjustable arm is perfect for reaching all of the areas of the back and neck. Easy to use, fairly lightweight, and the booklet explains what each attachment is for. Everyone in the household wanted to try and all said it gave great relief to tight, sore muscles. I would highly recommend this to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Roscoe Rules

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: My first massage gun. Mainly for my wife who has lots of aches and pains. Looked around for a while, researched, watched youtube reviews of a number of different massage/therapy guns of various budgets. Somehow stumbled upon this product, reviews were good and within the budget, so pulled the trigger. LOVING IT. Great quality - durable, several attachments and multiple speeds. Excellent battery life. Also liking the shape of it - you can grip the handle part that holds the battery to get to tougher-to-reach places. Gun is a little heavy, though, but probably by design as you can use less of your own effort to press. Very happy with this unit and definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vadim Khoper

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it Already
customer_reviews.text: I was leary at first of buy this one cuz of how much cheaper it is. I figured it might be a cheap knock off. I couldn't have been further from the truth!! Best one I've.owned yet. I use it pre and post Jiujitsu practice and to help improve circulation to my feet which is poor due to diabetic neuropathy
customer_reviews.author: John james

customer_reviews.title: What a relief... literally!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great relief after running miles. It’s cordless and rechargeable. Has a carrying case so I brought it to work with me and after running, then stretching, I used it on my calves and quads, and it immediately brought relief to the sore and tight muscles. Different attachments for different areas of the body. Another fantastic product by RENPHO!
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use Massage Gun
customer_reviews.text: I own a Sports Performance training company and have used most all Massage Guns . This gun is extremely easy to use due to its ergonomic design . Great for reaching the Achilles and ankle without purring your body in awkward positions . From a power standpoint it’s absolutely gets the job done . The best part about it for home use is it isn’t obnoxiously loud . It can be used while watching tv and won’t interrupt anything. Battery life is also great and love that it has removable battery. All in all it has hit on all of my expectations and I would absolutely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Massive power massage.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on the fact that I bought a Renpho digital by scale a while back and I am still very happy with it. First the case it comes in is very nice. It holds everything very well. The massager feels heavy duty and then you turn it on. This thing is powerful, way more than I thought. The design at first was weird to use but once you use it for a bit it's pretty comfortable. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Vallier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The battery was a huge issue with me on other models. When you put pressure on those at full speed, the battery died quick. This model here allows you to push and push at full speed (4) and can last for a week. Amazing product now I just need someone to use it on places I can’t reach. lol
customer_reviews.author: michael goeller

customer_reviews.title: Renpho does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I have renpho scale so I wanted to check out another renpho product. I am SO glad I got this one. My other massager doesn’t massage as deep and would have a pressure threshold so it would stop if I pushed too hard. This one will continue to work so I can get deep in the areas I need. I love the box it comes in too.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Sue

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker on my deployment
customer_reviews.text: Overseas deployment has a way of trashing your body on a daily basis, mostly because even if your sore or hurting you have to get up and do it all over again the next day. Just over the first few days, this massage gun made a world of difference! You don't even know how tense or sore you are sometimes, though my legs were doing ok turns out I had a lot of tension built up even with how often I stretch. It made such a difference I'm getting one for my wife.
customer_reviews.author: james p.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and pretty ergonomic
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product. It’s a product I’ve been looking for a while. The battery life is good. And it’s functioning really well. I tried the ball head for my back and the air cushion head for my foot so far and I like the results. It had alleviate me from my pain. I wish I read it earlier that the it’s not supposed to be used while wearing shirt when I massage my back. The shirt will be sticky to the ball head so try to avoid that. Overall, great product and pretty ergonomic.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun is absolutely unbelievable. I had immediate relief after use on a nagging shoulder tension I get everyday after work. I let has four different intensities which allow it to get really superficial to really deep massage. The best part is you can adjust it to be able to use it on yourself without the assistance of someone else. Amazing. I think the one thing that would make it better is if it could have multiple settings for type of motion. Nonetheless it is worth every dime and the packaging is great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Analissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic muscle pain and this has been amazing!! It's very powerful but easy to use. I have bought (and worn out) several other massagers, probably 3 to 4. I think this one will last. It gets the job done and helps my muscles relax. Worth every penny to me.
customer_reviews.author: apple1611

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: The product came on time but This product broke within a month.
customer_reviews.author: B K

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price... This machine rocks. I am not prepared to pay 300+ for a percussion massager right now. The price of Renpho was right in my price point. It comes with enough attachments to get into the muscles. I like getting in deep until it hurts and this fit the bill. The only thing I can say bad is the charger doesn't let you know when it's fully charged but when you plug it in and turn it on, the machine let's you know the charge level. I had this for about a month and I only had to charge it twice with about 5-10 minutes use daily.
customer_reviews.author: Sumo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My whole family is enjoying the massage gun. It is easy to use, even my kids can operate it. After carrying my elderly 60 pound dog around for a few days my back was hurting terribly. The massage gun has given me relief from the pain. My daughter has used the massage gun after her soccer workouts. I highly recommend this massage gun.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically designed for self use!! Relaxes and releases trigger points with vibration and pulse action from mild to effective intensity. As a therapeutic massage therapist for 18 years, my muscles thank Renpho for a useable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massage gun! It’s light weight and quiet and the battery really does last. I’ve had it a month now and I’ve not had any issues. The attachments give you a great variety for different body parts. Overall it’s worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dunfee1452

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised this came in a very nice carrying case. The massager has good speeds and I like that the battery is rechargeable. the head is able to move different directions so that I can reach places on my body that I can’t normally do on my own (ie-my back and neck area) the instructions are easy to follow. My favorite is the fork head. Overall excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I have used this near daily since it arrived. I normally use a foam roller to address muscle pain and mobility issues. This massager has become a welcomed addition to my pre and post workout recovery options. It works exceptionally well on areas that are typically difficult to target with a roller or tennis ball (calf muscle, foot arches, lats, pectorals, traps, etc..). So far the battery life has been excellent. I use it almost daily and have only had to charge it twice since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed! It works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager! I ordered it because I had a painful muscle that was in knots on my shoulder, I needed a way to reduce the pain. I used it for 2 consecutive days. The knot has gotten much smaller and the pain has really decreased. This massager is easy to use and it works!!! Don’t hesitate to buy it, it is worth every dime. You won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: D.L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Literally obsessed after 48 hours! A MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this product for less than a week now and I love it. I have recommended 3 of my workout friends already. It has an amazing battery life. It has an awesome charging light with the power of the battery and it has 4 speeds. The travel case is amazing makes it super easy to take around. The six heads it comes with all have amazing uses and are incredibly versatile. The price is totally reasonable especially since some of these things can cost $300+ this only being $100 is such a good deal. I highly suggest this one!! Hands down amazing
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA DOGGETT

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this particular massage gun because it was one of the highest rated to be able to use on yourself. Sometimes it's still a little awkward, but for the most part it is pretty easy to use it on your own back, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: I saw an ad for a competitor on Facebook and then searched for a cheaper version here. My friends and I were shocked at how well this worked. 3 months later it’s still going strong with no issues so far.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great handheld massager
customer_reviews.text: This is a great massager! I suffered from a severe calf injury. I went to physical therapy for several sessions and found tremendous relief; however, a few months later I felt the calf muscle becoming tight again along with minor discomfort. I searched YouTube for stretching exercises and found PT Drs. Bob & Brad, recommended & demo’d this massager, so I decided to try it. I use it 1-2x per week, lowest speed, and it soothes my calf and leg.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Great design and massage
customer_reviews.text: Have nothing to compare this to except a hand massage by a nontechnical person. Had a terrible muscle spasm on my left shoulder that was starting to dominate the entire back in pain. I ordered this unit and thanks to all that made it possible... arrived a day early. This is awesome. Instant relief. It felt so good I felt I needed to post a review. I will see if they will allow me to repost a review in a month. As I plan to use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: ATLAS

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DONT WASTE MONEY ON IT!!!!Device sucked it stopped working after 4 months, didn't even use it that much. Can't return the products just ended up wasting money. DONT BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Hamza

customer_reviews.title: Nice after a workout
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun is adjustable and easy to use alone. I like to use it after my workouts and after Jiu jitsu classes. The battery has been holding a great charge lasting many many sessions. You can’t go wrong with the price, it is much cheaper than the 400-500 dollar guns. I highly recommend and do not think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you... I was looking at massagers for $200, $300 dollars thinking that was going to get me quality- I was wrong! I paid half the price of others and within the first time using it, I was so relaxed, it nearly put me to sleep. I have intense tension in my neck/shoulders that cause me severe back pain. I loved the case it came in, and how everything was so neatly set in its place, it was beautifully presented, but works 10x better. I am completely in love with this massager and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha A

customer_reviews.title: Solid Massage Gun
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this massage gun! I do a lot of weightlifting, calisthenics, and am currently training for a marathon, so muscle soreness is very common. I've used various massage guns, and what i like the most about this one is how quiet it is. Being able to use this at any hour of the day without annoying my family is a huge plus. Between all of the different attachments and angles you can operate it at, i've always been able to get it to work for me, even on weird hard to reach spots in my back/between my shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Yes!! Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: YES!! Buy this! I’ve been bragging to everyone I know since I purchased this! From helping to relieve tight migraine-type shoulder pain to a metatarsal that prevents me from walking to my husband’s rock hard statin-caused-leg-muscle pain to my daughter’s plantar fasciitis, etc, this massage fun helps immensely! This Renpho R4 massage Gun Pro is worth every penny! The coupon convinced me but the product is keeping me! We could not be more pleased!! AND I am NOT being paid to say this. It’s truly excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Thea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great deep tissue massage.
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic lower back pain. This has helped relieve some pain giving me a deep tissue massage. I use it before and after the gym. It is a very good value for the money. I also love the different attachments included.
customer_reviews.author: eyezonme

customer_reviews.title: Great for sciatica relief
customer_reviews.text: Been a on-going problem with my sciatic pain.Heat,chiropractor visits all been tried and failed. My first time using the massage gun was phenomenal!I take it to work and it is a life saver on my 12 hour shifts.Bought one for a colleague who love it.This might be my ultimate Christmas present for everyone this year.Wonderful product.Would not hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: stephen nelson

customer_reviews.title: Form factor really differentiates this unit
customer_reviews.text: There's a whole bunch of massagers out there, but they're roughly the same form factor. This one is a bit special because of it's movable head and angled handle, which lets you reach spots more easily compared to the fixed massagers. Do note that the battery does need to be removed for charging in a separate charging stand.
customer_reviews.author: Edrick Wong

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Guys. The product is amazing. My friends have $300 theraguns and hypervolts and i really liked using them after basketball. Decided to invest in a massage gun myself but didnt want to pay as much. I decided to get this one because I have a smart scale from Renpho and it was really well built and still works after 2 years of use. I am so glad i made this choice. This gun is just as powerful AND it has the option to adjust the neck. For a third of the price of theragun/hypervolt, this is the massage gun you want.
customer_reviews.author: Quentin Wen

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective after a workout. Makes u feel good again for another workout and make stiff muscles dissapear. Recommended for people with pain due to sports in their muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Not good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not powerful as advertised. It only has a good design but power wise, it is not. I will return this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful massager. I really like how you can change the degree of it. It’s built well. Doesn’t feel cheap at all. I’m shocked that it came with a great case. I have really enjoyed using this. He has already helped me tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun is very powerful..attachments are coming in handy..the ability to move and make adjustments is also a nice feature makes it easy to reach difficult spots
customer_reviews.author: KatT

customer_reviews.title: Great cost benefit
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand for over a year and I saw this one for sale and gave it a shot. I love it. It is not super strong but it does all the work I need to recover or prep before workouts. The build quality is great and it is very easy to use. Also loved the case, makes it so much easier to storage and didn’t have to buy it separately.
customer_reviews.author: randomRaitec

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made all year!
customer_reviews.text: This massager packs a punch! I've had my eye on several versions of massage guns but was hesitant to spend $300 on one. I was a little skeptical when I came across this one. Don't let the price tag fool you. This massager is very powerful. I have used it every day since I received it. The battery life is excellent. I have only had to recharge it once in the two weeks I've owned it. My only regret is that I didn't buy it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: misti bean

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.text: This product works very well and exactly as described. It’s very easy to use. I really like the cordless operation and the ability to move the arm around to get better leverage to certain areas. I will have to get used to the feel on certain areas so pain relief isn’t awesome just yet but I know with repetition it will get better. I have only used it in the lowest setting and I was surprised at how strong that setting was. Glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: mwilson26

product_meta.title: RENPHO R4 Pro Massage Gun with Adjustable Arm, Deep Tissue Percussion Muscle Massager Handheld, Portable Body Massager for Athletes Sore Muscle and Stiffness Back Pain Relief
feature_bullets: Home Intense RENPHO R4 Pro Massage Gun: Well-built with an ergonomic grip, this muscle massage gun delivers the exact depth and speed of muscle treatment your body needs to relieve muscle tension, soreness and pain, as well as accelerate muscle activation and repair. Perfect for serious sports athletes, bodybuilders and those with dense body mass.

Ergonomic Shape for Home Gym Out: With an easy-grip handle and 5 adjustable angles to rotate the massage head, you can reach HARD-TO-REACH SPOTS without arm fatigue and wrist strain. You can even reach your upper and mid-back. Hold the gun in different directions to massage easily. Save effort.
6 massage heads and 4 speeds: Comes with 6 massage heads and 4 speed levels to target specific muscle groups and apply the right amount of pressure to relieve your muscle pain.

Lightweight & Rechargable battery: Weighing only 2.2lbs, this arm massager gun is portable and easy to use. It comes with a high-quality lithium battery, you can remove to charge. A full charge can power a weeks' worth of workouts.

Well Made Carrying Case for Workouts: Storing all things in one case, it is convenient to carry and keep track of everything. The massager is good for your daily muscle relief at home or at the gym. Easy and effective with two-handed operation. Makes a great gift.
